DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study estimate relative bioavailability food effect PF-03882845 tablet compare suspension formulation use previous clinical study .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of PF-03882845 Absorption In Healthy Volunteers Given Orally As Tablet Versus Suspension Formulations And Effect Of Food On Its Absorption
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , Females must nonchildbearing potential . Body mass index 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . Serum potassium > 5 mEq/L screening . Impaired kidney function ( estimate GFR < 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) . History sensitivity eplerenone , spironolactone , related compound .
